about_the_game:
"Isekai Captain" is a 2D fantasy cartoon-style light rogue-lite strategy game. You will play as a captain in another world, leading a team to battle against the demon army.

4 Gameplay Modes:

Adventure Mode:

5 levels with light storytelling, designed for quick character progression. Recommended for beginners.

The full version will include hidden levels and unlock the true ending.

Bridge Defense Mode:

A side-scrolling strategy mode similar to tower defense.

50 waves of enemies.

Train and command 4 squads (20 characters in total).

Requires a deep understanding of game mechanics and strategic team composition to succeed.

Survivor Mode:

Survive for 30 minutes.

Start with 5 level 1 characters.

Train and command them to endure the onslaught.

Campaign Mode (In Development):

A grand strategy mode with a world map.

Strengthen your towns, cut off enemy supply lines, assassinate elite demons, and seize strategic points.

Plan carefully and advance step by step to ultimately lead your army to the Demon King's lair!

Customizable Characters:

Players can customize their characters' race, appearance, starting class, and initial weapon.

Starting Classes:

Warrior, Hunter, Scholar (in development), and Cleric (in development).

Advanced Classes:

Dozens of advanced classes are available for promotion, each with unique traits, offering endless team-building possibilities. Examples include:

Lord, Mercenary, Champion, Knight, Ranger, Assassin, Swordmaster, Blade Master, Greatsword Fighter, Berserker, Shield Guard, Spear Guard, Heavy Knight, and more.

One-Handed Controls:

Move with left-click and issue commands with right-click.

Characters automatically attack when near enemies.

Teammates are AI-controlled, following the player and dodging some attacks.

Light Rogue-Lite Elements:

Each character has 20 levels.

Upon leveling up, draw 4 skill cards from a pool to customize your character.

With a 95% probability, you can build your character as planned.

No Meta Progression:

The game focuses on in-game progression, offering a rich and diverse experience.

Hundreds of weapon and class combinations are available.

Players must explore the vast promotion system to build their dream fantasy team.

short_description: "Isekai Captain" is a 2D fantasy Roguelike where you lead a squad against demons. Customize your hero, choose classes like Warrior or Hunter, and unlock advanced roles. Explore Kalan, grow your team, and stop the Demon King’s awakening in this epic adventure!
